violations: Dates are mentioned in promiseSetup and beats (e.g., '1493', '2019'), violating the avoid pattern prohibiting dates.
Explanatory context is provided in beats, including 'questionAnswered' fields, violating the zero-context requirement.
The CTA 'Quer saber como o mesmo medo se renova? Assista ao vídeo completo!' closes the loop, violating the no-resolution rule.
Multiple beats contain detailed explanations, contrary to the hook-only format.
parsed.corrections: Remove all dates, eliminate all explanatory sentences and 'questionAnswered' fields, omit the CTA, and keep only a single shocking statement with a local anchor (e.g., 'Isso foi Trento.').
